thread.title: Wanted for a serious assault against a child
thread.title_full: Wanted for a serious assault against a child | Granada - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Wanted for a serious assault against a child
text:
Merseyside Police is appealing for the publicâ€™s help to trace a 31-year-old man from Walton after a warrant was issued for his arrest at Liverpool Crown Court.
Zsolt Lakatos, from Ashdale Road, Walton was due to appear at Liverpool Crown court on Monday, February 6, this year for sentencing in relation to an offence of Section 18 wounding with intent against a child.
However, he failed to appear and a warrant was issued for his arrest. He was sentenced to 13 years in prison in his absence.
Lakatos, is described as a white man, 5ft 10in tall, of heavy build with black hair and brown eyes.
Extensive efforts have been made to find him but he remains outstanding.
Detectives would ask Lakatos himself, or anyone who knows of his whereabouts, or recognises him from the attached photograph to call 101 or Crimestoppers anonymously on 0800 555 111.
 Walton Merseyside
